detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Presale.buyTokens(address) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU1.sol#130-141):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)((token.totalSupply() + amount) <= maximumCap) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU1.sol#134)
	- ! token.mint(contributor,amount) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU1.sol#136)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenPurchase(0x0,contributor,msg.value,amount) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU1.sol#138)
	- Transfer(0x0,contributor,amount) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU1.sol#139)
